vat_exemption_text: Dodanie tovarov a služieb je oslobodené od dane z pridanej hodnoty podľa § 43 zákona č. 222/2004 Z.z. zo dňa 6.4.2004. Povinnosť priznať DPH prechádza na kupujúceho.
eu_directive_text: According to the title  IV, chapter 2,article 21,  of the directive of the European comitee n.112/2006/EC, is the consignee of the goods which is mentioned on the invoice, or other person, which si designated or accepted by the EU member state into which the goods are imported, liable to pay the VAT mentioned on the invoice.
